description: Changes the position of this <%=class_name%>'s charge particles.
**Positive** X values move it to the *right*, negative X values move it to the *left*.
**Positive** Y values move it *downwards*, negative Y values move it *upwards*.

parameters.name: X
parameters.desc: The **horizontal offset** you want to give this <%=class_name%>'s charge particles.

parameters.name: X
